paragraphs.text: Everybody is interesting if you give them the chance to be.
paragraphs.name: 6c33
108d
paragraphs.text: People, ideas, and things don’t have to be good to be popular. They don’t have to make sense either.
Complaining is typically a waste of time.
paragraphs.name: 674d
d420
paragraphs.text: Life, the universe, and the meaning of it all are troublesome subjects; questioning them never fails to summon an unpleasant sensation.
Gratitude is the only reliable source of fulfillment.
The older you get, the faster the time goes.

paragraphs.name: 6c33
paragraphs.text: Everybody is interesting if you give them the chance to be.

4f50a7f2290a.title: So true. It’s my 20th wedding anniversary this year and it amazes me how quickly it’s come around.

paragraphs.text: So true. It’s my 20th wedding anniversary this year and it amazes me how quickly it’s come around.
For some reason I always feel it’s 2007, give or take a year or so. But 2017?

virtuals.subtitle: For some reason I always feel it’s 2007, give or take a year or so. But 2017?

content.subtitle: For some reason I always feel it’s 2007, give or take a year or so. But 2017?

paragraphs.text: That’s very true!
paragraphs.name: c144

paragraphs.text: I’ve been re-writing this line in my head ever since hitting publish. What I’m trying to convey is the feeling of defeat that arises when you transfix on these topics with the hope of producing an answer.
paragraphs.name: da89

paragraphs.text: Yet, like you said, the awe they produce can be very satisfying.

78084df58cbe.title: “It’s unhealthy to avoid being alone. It’s also unhealthy to be alone too much.”

paragraphs.text: “It’s unhealthy to avoid being alone. It’s also unhealthy to be alone too much.”
paragraphs.name: 84ea

paragraphs.text: This is technically correct, but it is also important to keep in mind the optimum level (proportion of alone to not alone time) will vary depending on the individual.
